data.name: IconHelp
data.value: The icon for the station, if you don't use a custom one. It can be any UIIcon record.

data.name: StationNameHelp
data.value: Controls the name of your station that will be displayed in the game. Special characters are escaped properly.

data.name: NoExeFound
data.value: The path to the Cyberpunk 2077 executable has not been set. Please set it now.

data.name: RadioExtPathPlaceholder
data.value: <no path set; radioExt is not installed>

data.name: StagingPathPlaceholder
data.value: <no path set; radio stations need to be staged first>

data.name: NonCyberpunkExe
data.value: The selected file did not look like Cyberpunk 2077. Please try again.

data.name: CustomIconHelp
data.value: Specifies whether or not you want to use a custom icon for the radio station.

data.name: InkPathHelp
data.value: Points to the .inkatlas that holds the icon texture.

data.name: InkPartHelp
data.value: Specifies which part of the .inkatlas should be used for the icon, e.g., gryphon_5

data.name: FMHelp
data.value: Used to place the station at the right place in the stations list. If the station name has an FM number, it should be the same.

data.name: VolumeHelp
data.value: Overall volume multiplier for the station. Make sure all songs have the same volume, then adjust the overall volume of the station with this value to match up with vanilla stations.

data.name: VolumeValHelp
data.value: The currently selected volume. Use the slider or double click value to change.

data.name: UseStreamHelp
data.value: Indicates if this station should use a web stream for its audio source.

data.name: StreamURLHelp
data.value: The URL of the web stream to use.

data.name: OpenURLErrorOccured
data.value: An error occurred while trying to open the URL:

data.name: DeleteAllSongsConfirm
data.value: Are you sure you want to remove all songs?

data.name: ExportHelp
data.value:
Click "Export to Staging" to export the stations above to the staging folder first. You will be able to review the stations before copying to the game directory.
If something doesn't look correct, exit out of this window and make changes in the main application.

data.name: StreamURLError
data.value: Please enter a valid stream URL.

data.name: StagingPathHelp
data.value: Select the radio station staging path.

data.name: NoStagingPathFound
data.value: The staging folder for radio stations is not yet set. Please set it now.

data.name: NoRadioExtMsg
data.value: You do not have the radioExt mod installed. Can't export radio stations to game.

data.name: AboutInfo
data.value: A tool to help create and manage custom radio stations in Cyberpunk 2077 when using the radioExt Mod.

data.name: UpdateAvailableNotice
data.value: There is a new update for CRA. Do you want to open the downloader now?

data.name: NoUpdateAvailable
data.value: You are on the latest version. No update available.

data.name: UpdateFolderOpening
data.value: Update complete. The containing folder will now be opened and the application will be closed.

data.name: InvalidStream
data.value: Invalid stream - Will not work in game

data.name: NoInternetMsg
data.value: Could not check for updates. Please check your internet and try again.

data.name: CheckForUpdatesOptionHelp
data.value: If checked, enables the application to check for updates immediately after started.

data.name: AutoExportOptionHelp
data.value: If checked, your stations will immediately export to the game after successfully exporting to staging.

data.name: EditPathsOptionHelp
data.value: Opens the path's dialog to edit the staging and game base path.

data.name: NewLogFileOptionHelp
data.value: If checked, specifies that a new log file will be created on every run of the app.

data.name: ConfigResetConfirm
data.value: Are you sure you want to reset the configuration to default values?

data.name: ConfigSaveError
data.value: There was an error saving the configuration. Please make sure the config.yml file exists.

data.name: ConfirmRefreshStations
data.value: Are you sure you want to refresh your stations from disk? You will lose any pending changes to stations.

data.name: EditLogsPathOptionHelp
data.value: Opens a folder dialog where you can choose a new path to save log files.

data.name: SelectLogPathDesc
data.value: Select the location to store log files

data.name: ExportWindowTip
data.value: Only Enabled stations are exported to the game.

data.name: ConfirmExit
data.value: There are {0} stations pending export. Are you sure you want to quit?

data.name: BackupFailedException
data.value: Backup failed due to an error: {0}

data.name: BackupFolderDesc
data.value: Select a folder to save the backup to

data.name: BackupPathIsSubpath
data.value: Backup path cannot be within the staging path.

data.name: ExportToGameMissingSongs
data.value: There are {0} station(s) with a total of {1} invalid song path(s). Do you want to continue exporting?

data.name: ApiUnsavedChanges
data.value: You have unsaved changes to your API key. Please save or clear the key before closing.

data.name: StagingPathWithinGamePath
data.value: Staging path cannot be within game path!

data.name: GamePathWithinStagingPath
data.value: Game path cannot be within staging path!

data.name: ConfirmSyncStations
data.value: Are you sure you want to synchronize the staging and game directories? You will lose any pending changes to stations.

data.name: MissingStations
data.value: There are {0} station(s) in the game's folder missing from the staging folder. Would you like to synchronize the stations?

data.name: BackupInProgress
data.value: Backup is in progress. Please wait...

data.name: SyncFailedException
data.value: Synchronization failed due to an error: {0}

data.name: SyncInProgress
data.value: Synchronization is in progress. Please wait...

data.name: WatchForChangesHelp
data.value: If checked, the game's radios path will be watched for changes and automatically sync new stations to staging.

data.name: BackupCompressionLevelHelp
data.value: Indicates the level of compression used when backing up the staging directory.

data.name: BackupPathIsSubpathGame
data.value: Backup path cannot be within the game path.

data.name: EstimatedBackupSizeDisclaimer
data.value: * This is an estimate based on the selected compression level in the configuration. Actual size may be different.

data.name: BackupPreviewError
data.value: An error occurred while loading the backup preview.

data.name: DefaultSongLocationHelp
data.value: Indicates the folder that imported station's song files should be saved to. Defaults to the MyMusic folder.

data.name: InvalidActiveIcon
data.value: The active icon is invalid. Please ensure the icon is imported and the archive file is present.

data.name: IconEditorCopyIconToStagingNullEmpty
data.value: The icon archive path was null or empty.

data.name: IconEditor_IconAlreadyCreated_DragDrop
data.value: This icon has already been created and marked as read-only. Please create a new icon if you want a different image.

data.name: IconEditor_ImageNotSquare
data.value: The image is not square. Problems may occur in game.

data.name: IconEditorCopyIconToStagingImageNullEmpty
data.value: The icon .png path was null or empty.

data.name: IconEditor_SetFieldsBasedOnImagePath_The_extracted_image_could_not_be_found_
data.value: The extracted image could not be found.

data.name: IconManagerForm_RemoveIcon_Are_you_sure_you_want_to_delete_this_icon_
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this icon?

data.name: IconManagerForm_RemoveIcon_Do_you_want_to_delete_associated_icon_files_from_staging__This_will_delete_the_copied__archive_file_and_the_associated_PNG_
data.value: Do you want to delete associated icon files from staging? This will delete the copied .archive file and the associated PNG.

data.name: IconManagerForm_btnDeleteAllIcons_Click_Are_you_sure_you_want_to_remove_ALL_icons_from_this_station_
data.value:
Are you sure you want to remove ALL icons from this station? **This is a destructive operation!**
Make sure you've backed up your staging folder first ;)

data.name: IconManagerForm_btnDeleteAllIcons_Click_Do_you_want_to_also_delete_associated_icon_s_files_from_staging
data.value: Do you want to also delete associated icon's files from staging? This will delete all the copied .archive file and the associated PNGs.

data.name: IconManagerForm_CheckForCopy_
data.value:
The icon already exists and is associated with the following stations: {0}.
A new copy of the icon will be created, but it will reference the same underlying files on disk.
Note: Any changes to the activation status or other station-specific properties will only affect this station.

data.name: IconManagerForm_CheckForCopy_This_icon_is_already_associated_with_the_current_station_
data.value: This icon is already associated with the current station.

data.name: MainForm_FromZipImportDesc
data.value:
Imported {0} stations: {1}
If an icon was included with the station, it has been added as well. However, you will have to extract it manually to get the preview in CRA.

data.name: SelectDefaultSongLocationDesc
data.value: Select the default location to store song files

data.name: IconImportInProgress
data.value: An icon import is currently in progress. Please wait for the import to finish.

data.name: IconExportInProgress
data.value: An icon export is currently in progress. Please wait for the export to finish.

data.name: ConfirmSyncStationsExternal
data.value: Changes were made to the game's radios directory. Do you want to synchronize your staging and game directories?

data.name: ExportInProgress
data.value: Export is in progress. Please wait...

data.name: ConfirmRestore
data.value: Are you sure you want to restore the staging folder? This will overwrite your existing stations!

data.name: ConfirmClearAllData
data.value:
**DESTRUCTIVE OPERATION**
Ensure you create a backup of your stations before clearing data. This will remove all stations immediately from staging (the game is not touched). Are you sure you want to clear all station data?

data.name: RestoreDescription
data.value: The following files will be restored to the staging folder.

data.name: RestoreForm_PreviewCompleted
data.value: Restore preview completed. Ready to start restore operation.

data.name: RestoreForm_ErrorWhileRestoring
data.value: An error occurred while trying to start the restore operation.

data.name: IconEditor_AtlasName_Hint
data.value: The name of the atlas file that the icon is stored in.

data.name: IconEditor_Sha256Hash_Hint
data.value: The SHA256 hash of the archive file.

data.name: IconEditor_ArchivePath_Hint
data.value: The path to the archive file that contains the icon.

data.name: IconEditor_ImagePath_Hint
data.value: The path to the image file that created the icon or the extracted image.

data.name: IconEditor_IconPath_Hint
data.value: The path to the icon within the archive file. Autogenerated.

data.name: IconEditor_IconPart_Hint
data.value: The part of the icon within the icon path. Autogenerated.

data.name: IconManagerHelp
data.value: Opens the icon manager dialog for this station to mange the icons.

data.name: CustomIconPictureHelp
data.value: Shows a preview of the active icon for this station. Drag-and-drop a .PNG here to quickly add it to the station.

data.name: ParseFromRadioGardenHelp
data.value: Opens a dialog to parse the API url from the web URL for a radio.garden web stream.

data.name: StreamPlayerHelp
data.value: Allows you to preview the audio from the stream specified.

data.name: AddSongsHelp
data.value: Opens a file selector to add valid audio files to this station's song list.

data.name: RemoveFromOrderHelp
data.value: Removes the song from the station's ordered song list. Does not remove the song from the station.

data.name: AddToOrderHelp
data.value: Adds the song to the station's ordered song list.

data.name: RemoveSongsHelp
data.value: Removes all selected songs from the station. Does not delete files on disk.

data.name: RemoveAllSongsHelp
data.value: Removes ALL songs from the station. Does not delete files on disk.

data.name: TotalSongsHelp
data.value: Shows the total number of song files associated with this station.

data.name: TotalStationSizeHelp
data.value: Shows the total file size of all song files in the station.

data.name: RestoreFailedException
data.value: Restore failed due to an error: {0}

data.name: IconEditor_IconName_Hint
data.value: The name of the icon within the station. Can be anything you want.

data.name: IconEditor_CopyToClipboard
data.value: Copies the corresponding text to the clipboard.

data.name: IconEditor_ImportIcon
data.value: Start's the import process for icon generation. This can take some time.

data.name: IconEditor_ExtractIcon
data.value: Starts the .archive extraction process for an icon. This can take some time.

data.name: IconEditor_CustomIconPictureHelp
data.value: Shows a preview of this icon (if extracted or imported). If icon hasn't been created yet, drag-and-drop a .PNG here to create it.

data.name: CopySongFilesToBackupHelp
data.value: If checked, indicates that song files (including external) should be included in the backup .zip file for the stations.

data.name: LocateAllMissingSongsDesc
data.value: Select the folder containing the missing song files

data.name: MainForm_NoStationsImported
data.value: No stations were imported. Verify the .zip/.rar file contains a valid station.

data.name: ForbiddenPath_RootDirectory
data.value: The staging path cannot be set to the root of a drive

data.name: ForbiddenPath_SystemDirectory
data.value: The staging path cannot be set to a reserved system directory.

data.name: ForbiddenPath_ProgramFiles
data.value: The staging path cannot be set to the Program Files directory.

data.name: ForbiddenPath_UserAppData
data.value: The staging path cannot be set to an application data directory.

data.name: ForbiddenPath_VortexFolder
data.value: The staging path cannot be set to a Vortex-managed folder.

data.name: ForbiddenPath_KeywordMatch
data.value: The staging path contains forbidden keywords. You can define these in the settings.

data.name: SplashScreen_StagingPathForbidden
data.value: Staging path was invalid. Reset to an empty string.

data.name: ForbiddenPathsHelp
data.value: Defines the keywords that are searched when setting the staging path for radio stations. Any paths that contain keywords here are not allowed.

data.name: NewKeywordHelp
data.value: Add a new keyword to the forbidden path check.

data.name: DeleteSelectedKeywordHelp
data.value: Delete the selected keywords from the list. It is usually better to just disable the keyword with the checkbox.

data.name: GroupNotAllowedToBeModified
data.value: The 'System Paths' group cannot be modified.

data.name: OodleDllMissing
data.value: 'oodle.dll' was not found in the game's files. You may have issues creating and extracting station icons.

data.name: OodleDllFound
data.value: Found {0} in the game files! You should not have issues with icons.

data.name: ConfigReloadConfirm
data.value: Are you sure you want to reload the configuration from the file? All unsaved options will be lost.

data.name: ConfigReloadError
data.value: An error occurred while reloading the configuration file.

data.name: ConfigError
data.value: The configuration file was invalid or could not be read. A default config will be used.

data.name: AboutCredits
data.value: Special thanks to justarandomguyintheinternet (https://github.com/justarandomguyintheinternet/CP77_radioExt) for the awesome radioExt mod! Special thanks to demonseedxp (https://next.nexusmods.com/profile/demonseedxp) for the app icon and splash screen!

data.name: ConversionOngoing
data.value: Files are currently being converted. Please wait until they have finished.

data.name: NoFilesSelected_Conversion
data.value: No files were selected for conversion. Please select at least one file and try again.

data.name: ChangeOutputDirectoryDescription
data.value: Select a folder to save converted audio files to

data.name: AudioConverterPrompt
data.value: There are {0} file(s) that need to be converted in order to work with radioExt. Would you like to convert them now?

data.name: AudioConvert_ConfirmRemoveFiles
data.value: Are you sure you want to remove {0} files from the queue?
